attributes.action: to guarantee that the British people will be permitted a referendum on the new EU reform Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Significant differences appear to be emerging about what is and what is not included,  This is a very critical decision for our country and as such it is important enough for the people to have their say.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
